PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIHtml

Represents a base UI view. This widget is a container, which holds other widgets.

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIContainer

Options

This widget accepts the following options: None
